A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excellent addition to the Star Wars timeline.  Rather than the same old formula\, we get twists\, turns\, unexpected surprises\, major deaths earlier than would have been standard\, etc.  Great action sequences\, great development of Kylo and Ren as characters.  Sets us up for a time jump to Episode 9 where I assume real life deaths will have been addressed and the Resistance has built itself back up for a final confrontation.  I had no issues of the handling of Luke\, and I thought the inclusion of Yoda was perfect.  Glad to see ESB puppet Yoda vs creepy Prequel CGI Yoda.
